page.title: 01CLOPHILL AND DISTRICT
page.content: Our area is composed of farmland to the north and east, with a medium sized village in the southwest. {Clophill}lies along the valley of the River Flitt. It is a mixture of old houses and modern developments, both publicly and privately owned. There are{1233}names on the{Electoral Roll. The nearest small towns are{Ampthill}& {Shefford,}with{Luton}and{Bedford}about 10 miles away to the south & north. There is a small amount of work in the area but most people commute to the towns. Buses run hourly north and south but only two-hourly to{Ampthill. Older children are bused to school at {Shefford}and{Harlington. We have a general store/post office, a butcher and five public houses. At{Chicksands}there is an American Air Force Base. It is a station for the missile early warning system.
